content: I guess the chain would do an ETC type split. I don't think users would accept an ofac fork. author: 0xsadcat
content:
I don't think there's legal basis to force developers to make specific changes yet. so there's still a short period of time in which further development is possible. but rule of law is visibly in its last years globally if control over ethereum is important, you will see 'official' people like vitalik, geth developers even being tortured in prison to force them to do something, like publicly say the new fork with sanctions is good, etc.
there's only one defence - to allow the system to run forever without any protocol level changes, and ideally declare end of all forks pre-emptively. no need for a chaotic etc-type fork then.
